0_instruction: The potency of your Healing Potion can be upgraded at the {c_highlight}Alchemist{/c} {icon:Marker_Crafter_Alchemist, 2.0}. Upgrading will require gold and herbs collected from around the world.
1_instruction: Healing Potion charges can be increased by earning {c_highlight}Renown{/c} in each Region of Sanctuary. Region Renown can be viewed on the map.
title: Healing Potion Upgrades
